Trade/Device Name(s): NeoMarkers Rabbit Monoclonal Anti-Human PR Antibody (Clone SP2)
Specimen Type(s): Formalin fixed, paraffin embedded normal and neoplastic tissues
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for NeoMarkers Rabbit Monoclonal Anti-Human PR Antibody (Clone SP2) for IHC detection of progesterone receptor in formalin fixed, paraffin embedded tissues.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of progesterone receptor by IHC in tissue sections to aid in prognosis and management of breast cancer patients.
